title: 7.2.5 Implement IAMScanner with rules
body:
## Parent Issue
#30 - 7.2 Security Scanner Engine

## Objective
Implement IAM security scanner with password policy, MFA, credential rules.

## Rules
- IAM_001: Root Account Has Access Keys (Critical)
- IAM_002: MFA Not Enabled for Users (High)
- IAM_003: Access Keys Not Rotated >90 days (High)
- IAM_004: Password Policy Too Weak (Medium)
- IAM_005: Unused Credentials >90 days (Medium)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/iam.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/rules/iam_rules.py`

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
